lyrics.stanza: Lower and lower, dear Lord, at Thy feet, Seeking Thy Spirit, Thy mercy so sweet; Down in our need, blessed Master, we fall, Lower and lower; be Thou all in all.
Lower and lower, down at Thy cross, All the world's treasure counting but dross; Down at Thy feet, blessed Savior, we fall, Lower, still lower, Christ all in all!
Lower and lower, dear Savior, we pray, Losing the self-life still more every day; Weak and unworthy, we're looking above: Empty us wholly; then fill us with love.
Lower and lower; yet higher we rise Lifted in Christ, freed from all the earth ties: Humbly we follow the way of the cross. Then, crowns of glory, and gain for all loss.
